page.title: 04GOSPORT COUNCIL
page.content: Improvements made where I live. My Mum thinks that the{Council have already improved the area. I think that they could improve it a bit more by building a few more shops on the corners of the streets and using up some of the{waste ground}that is about, by putting in a few more parks with better{facilities. I also think that the{Council should start thinking about people whose houses are not big enough for them. There are too many people living in the same house. I know someone who has four children and there are three beds all lined up in the same bedroom because they have to share a room. They only have a two_bedroomed house; one for the parents, the other for the children. It is a squash for such a big family.
